## Overview

Welcome to the **Starship**, a 5-week program designed to teach students the fundamentals of Python Programming. Each week focuses on a specific aspect of programming.

Explore the weekly breakdown below to access detailed activities and presentations.

[HS-Coded](https://github.com/HS-Coded)

[Individual Repository](https://github.com/HS-Coded/starship-PCain02)

[Progress Survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSevvV3JlZPBDaiI5nOu_IWNnTSQP95Txs1-fSrR0RvU8oTzDA/viewform)

## 6-Week Breakdown

```{=html}
<div class="curriculum-section">
  <div class="curriculum-box">
      <h3>Episode 1: Liftoff!</h3>
      <p>Learn the basics of using a Codespace and navigating through files using a terminal.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="curriculum-box">
      <h3>Episode 2: Cracking the code</h3>
      <p>Create custom variables and use Python mathematics functionality.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="curriculum-box">
      <h3>Episode 3: Running in Circuits</h3>
      <p>Learn about `if` statements and `<``>` symbols.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="curriculum-box">
      <h3>Episode 4: Droning On & On</h3>
      <p>Talk to the computer and use the controls.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="curriculum-box">
      <h3>Episode 5: Can You Dig It</h3>
      <p>Run soil tests and experiment with variable values</p>
  </div>
</div>
```

---

## Learning Outcomes

By the end of this curriculum, students will:

- Make their own GitHub Account.
- Learn about GitHub Codespaces.
- Understand the principles of Python Programming.
